/*name of code*/
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
#include<iomanip>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cctype>
#include<cmath>
#include<fstream>
#include<set>
#include<bitset>

//#define lol long long
#define ull unsigned long long int
#define inti long long int

using namespace std;


bool cmp(const inti &a,const inti &b)
{
	return a>b;
}


#define inti long long int


int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	inti test_case,t=1;
	cin>>test_case;
	while(test_case--)
	{
		inti n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		inti scenario=m;
		double A[n];
		for(inti i=0;i<n;i++) cin>>A[i];
		inti a[n];
		for(inti i=0;i<n;i++) {a[i]=(inti)(A[i]*1000); a[i]+=9; a[i]/=10;}
		sort(a,a+n,cmp);
		inti w=1;
		cout<<"Case "<<t++<<":\n";
		while(m--)
		{
			inti hash[n];
			for(inti i=0;i<n;i++) hash[i]=0;
			double amt;
			cin>>amt;
			inti amount=(inti)(amt*1000);
			amount+=9;
			amount/=10;
			for(inti i=0;i<n;i++)
			{
				inti j=0;
				inti temp=a[i]*j;
				while(temp <= amount) 
				{
					temp=a[i]*(++j);
				}
				j--;
				hash[i]=j;
				amount=amount-a[i]*hash[i];
			}
			cout<<"Scenario "<<w++<<":\n";
			for(inti x=0;x<n;x++)
			{
				if(hash[x])
				{
					if((a[x]%100) == 0) cout<<a[x]/100;
					else cout<<std::fixed<<setprecision(2)<<(double)(((double)a[x])/100.0);
					cout<<" "<<hash[x]<<"\n";
				}
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
